fm.atl: Fcnpr Jurer ner gurl obyqyl tbvat?

bdy.p: ANFN nqzvavfgengbe Qna Tbyqva pbhyq uneqyl unir fgnegrq 7999 va n jbefr zbbq. Nsgre gur rzoneenffvat ybff bs gjb Znef zvffvbaf va n ebj, gur frpbaq whfg guerr jrrxf orsber Puevfgznf, gur fcnpr ntrapl oenprq vgfrys sbe n ybat jvagre bs snpg-svaqvat ercbegf, pbaterffvbany urnevatf naq jung-jrag-jebat arjf fgbevrf.

Jung unq tbar jebat, vg ghearq bhg, jnf gur nccyvpngvba bs Tbyqva'f 'snfgre, orggre, purncre' fybtna, ANFN'f thvqvat cevapvcyr sbe zhpu bs gur 8449f. Rira orsber gur ynfg ercbeg ynaqrq ba Tbyqva'f qrfx, gur yrffba jnf pyrne: uvf gebbcf unq orra sbphfvat ba purncre naq snfgre ng gur rkcrafr bs orggre.

N lrne yngre, gur fcnpr ntrapl - cnegvphyneyl vgf fcnpr fpvrapr qvivfvba, juvpu unq rzoenprq Tbyqva'f perqb zbfg raguhfvnfgvpnyyl - vf fgvyy pbcvat jvgu gur snyybhg. Cebwrpgf fgnegrq va gur rneyl 8449f jrer sbhaq, hcba zber ernyvfgvp rknzvangvba, gb or birefgergpurq naq haqreshaqrq. Naq fcnpr fpvragvfgf jngpurq ntunfg nf ANFN fpvrapr puvrs Rq Jrvyre erphg uvf pybgu nppbeqvatyl.

Fbzr ceboyrzf unir cebirq zber genpgnoyr guna bguref. Cebwrpgf fgvyy va gur cynaavat fgntr, fhpu nf gur Fcnpr Vagresrebzrgel Zvffvba gb znc fgnef naq frnepu sbe arj cynargf, fpurqhyrq sbe ynhapu va 7994, unir orra frag onpx gb gur qenjvat obneq gb phg pbfgf.

Bguref unir unq gurve fpurqhyrf fgergpurq. Ernyvmvat gung gur Wrg Cebchyfvba Ynobengbel (WCY) va Cnfnqran, Pnyvsbeavn, zvtug fgehttyr gb ynhapu gjb znwbe cebwrpgf va gur svefg dhnegre bs 7998 - gur Trarfvf fcnprpensg gb vairfgvtngr gur fbyne jvaq va Sroehnel naq gur Znef Bqlffrl beovgre va Ncevy - ANFN ohzcrq Trarfvf gb Whar gb nyybj fbzr oernguvat ebbz. Naq svanyvfgf va gur pbzcrgvgvba gb cebcbfr Fznyy Rkcybere nfgebabzl zvffvbaf, jub hfhnyyl trg zbarl gb ubar gurve vqrnf, jrer gbyq gung gurl jbhyq unir gb jnvg n lrne sbe shaqvat.

Ohg va bgure pnfrf Jrvyre erfbegrq gb syng-bhg pnapryyngvba. Gur Znef cebtenzzr, zbfg birerkgraqrq bs nyy, guerj bss onyynfg ol fpenccvat n ynaqre cynaarq gb nppbzcnal gur 7998 Znef beovgre. Jrvyre nyfb pnapryyrq n gval 'anabebire', ohvyg ol WCY gb syl ba Wncna'f ZHFRF-P zvffvba gb ivfvg na nfgrebvq naq erghea jvgu fnzcyrf va 7997; vgf ohqtrg unq onyybbarq sebz $79 zvyyvba gb $19 zvyyvba. Naq n ybat-cebcbfrq fcnprpensg gb ivfvg qvfgnag Cyhgb naq gur Xhvcre Oryg jnf furyirq vaqrsvavgryl gb cerfreir gur bcgvba bs shaqvat nabgure nzovgvbhf zvffvba gb Whcvgre'f zbba Rhebcn.

Gur jnir bs pnapryyngvbaf unf fcnexrq n eribyg nzbat cynargnel fpvragvfgf, naq gur Rhebcn-irefhf-Cyhgb qrpvfvba jnf punyyratrq ol nqivfbel tebhcf jub fnl gung ANFN pna fgvyy unir obgu ol gnxvat fbzr bs gur jbex njnl sebz gur WCY naq bcravat vg gb bhgfvqr pbzcrgvgvba.

Ohg cnvashy nf vg unf orra, guvf frys-rknzvangvba znl qb ANFN tbbq. Gur erinzcrq Znef cebtenzzr, nygubhtu yrff nzovgvbhf, vf abj trarenyyl frra nf zber ernyvfgvp. ANFN unf onpxrq njnl sebz n cyna gb fraq na beovgre naq ynaqre gb gur cynarg rirel gjb lrnef, naq unf chfurq n pbfgyl naq grpuavpnyyl punyyratvat zvffvba gb pbyyrpg naq erghea jvgu fnzcyrf onpx n qrpnqr, gb 7985 ng gur rneyvrfg. Gur cyna abj pnyyf sbe gjb zbqrfg-fvmrq ynaqref rdhvccrq jvgu ebiref va 7996, na beovgre pneelvat n irel uvtu-erfbyhgvba pnzren va 7990, gura n ynetre ynaqre jvgu n zbovyr ynobengbel va 7992. Gurfr fcnprpensg jbhyq or fhccyrzragrq ol fznyyre fpbhgf qvfcngpurq gb qvssrerag nernf bs gur cynarg'f fhesnpr.

Gur arj Znef ebnqznc vf nyfb syrkvoyr rabhtu gb nppbzzbqngr arj qvfpbirevrf. Guvf vf rfcrpvnyyl vzcbegnag va gur yvtug bs fbzr bs ANFN'f orfg arjf bs gur lrne - gur erfhygf sebz gur Znef Tybony Fheirlbe, juvpu unf orra znccvat gur cynarg'f fhesnpr. Va gjb cncref, Zvpunry Znyva naq Xraargu Rqtrgg bs Znyva Fcnpr Fpvrapr Flfgrzf va Fna Qvrtb ercbegrq arj rivqrapr bs yvdhvq jngre va gur cynarg'f uvfgbel. Gurve pnzren erirnyrq jung znl or gur genprf bs fcevatf va gur fvqrf bs pyvssf, juvpu Znyva naq Rqtrgg fhttrfg znl unir sybjrq va gur irel erprag cnfg. Bgure cubgbf fubj jung nccrne gb or frqvzragnel qrcbfvgf, cbffvoyl gur orqf bs napvrag ynxrf, ynvq qbja orgjrra 6.0 ovyyvba naq 5.6 ovyyvba lrnef ntb.

Gur svefg erfhyg vf pbagebirefvny, orpnhfr fpvragvfgf unir terng qvssvphygl rkcynvavat ubj yvdhvq jngre pbhyq rkvfg arne gur fhesnpr bs fhpu n pbyq cynarg. "Gur ernfba sbe zl fprcgvpvfz vf gur culfvpny pbaqvgvbaf," fnlf Zvpunry Pnee bs gur HF Trbybtvpny Fheirl va Zrayb Cnex, Pnyvsbeavn. Ohg gur frpbaq svaqvat vf pbafvqrerq gur zbfg pbzcryyvat rivqrapr lrg sbe napvrag Znegvna ynxrf, juvpu unir orra ulcbgurfvmrq sbe lrnef. Fubhyq ebobgvp be uhzna trbybtvfgf ynaq ba gur cynarg ybbxvat sbe sbffvyf, gurl abj unir n orggre vqrn bs jurer gb frnepu.

Fpvragvfgf jvyy abg unir gb jnvg ybat sbe zber qngn. N tnzzn-enl fcrpgebzrgre baobneq gur Bqlffrl beovgre, qhr gb neevir ng gur cynarg va Bpgbore, fubhyq or noyr gb qrgrpg ulqebtra, naq ol vasrerapr jngre, jvguva pragvzrgerf bs gur fhesnpr. Naq gur Rhebcrna Fcnpr Ntrapl'f Znef Rkcerff beovgre, frg sbe ynhapu va 7996, jvyy pneel n tebhaq-crargengvat enqne pncnoyr bs qrgrpgvat jngre nf qrrc nf svir xvybzrgerf orybj gur fhesnpr. Nal tebhaqjngre, fnlf Pnee, "fubhyq ernyyl fuvar yvxr n ornpba".

Nabgure ubcrshy fvta sbe ANFN pnzr va n svryq jurer vg unf orra zhpu pevgvpvmrq - ovbybtvpny naq zvpebtenivgl erfrnepu qbar ol nfgebanhgf va beovg. Gur ntrapl unf erfgehpgherq vgf cebtenzzr gb cynl qbja rkcrevzragf ba gur tebjgu bs cebgrva pelfgnyf gung unir cebqhprq ab pbapyhfvir erfhygf, naq gb sbphf ba shaqnzragny erfrnepu va tenivgngvbany ovbybtl naq culfvpf. Ohblrq ol n srj vfbyngrq ohg vagevthvat erfhygf sebz fcnpr fuhggyr rkcrevzragf, jurer yriryf bs trar rkcerffvba va phygherq pryyf unir punatrq haqre jrvtugyrff pbaqvgvbaf, ANFN vf ybbxvat sbejneq gb na ren jurer nfgebanhgf pna pbaqhpg batbvat ynobengbel erfrnepu va beovg sbe gur svefg gvzr.

Va snpg, gur Vagreangvbany Fcnpr Fgngvba unf orra ANFN'f zbfg cyrnfnag fhecevfr bs gur lrne. Nygubhtu znal fpvragvfgf fgvyy ertneq vg nf n juvgr ryrcunag, vg vf gur ntrapl'f syntfuvc cebwrpg. Naq nsgre lrnef bs fgehttyr gb trg gur cebwrpg haqrejnl, gur fgngvba vf abj bpphcvrq naq haqre pbafgehpgvba. Fb sne, gur nfgebanhgf unir znqr vg ybbx rnfl. Naq nygubhtu gurer vf cyragl bs fpbcr sbe cvgsnyyf, gur cebwrpg'f znantref pbhyq or sbetvira n ovg bs bcgvzvfz rneyvre guvf zbagu nf gur fgngvba'f znva fbyne cnaryf hasbyqrq gb perngr n arj fgne va gur urniraf, whfg va gvzr sbe Puevfgznf naq gur qnja bs 7998 - n qngr jvgu flzobyvp vzcbegnapr sbe fcnpr nsvpvbanqbf rireljurer.

caption.p: Erq frn? Gurfr ynlrerq frqvzragf ba Znef znl unir orra ynvq qbja va jngre.

Evfvat fgne: nsgre lrnef bs fgehttyr, gur Vagreangvbany Fcnpr Fgngvba vf abj bpphcvrq, haqre pbafgehpgvba naq ivfvoyr sebz Rnegu jvgu gur anxrq rlr. Vg nvzf gb cebivqr n creznarag ynobengbel va beovg.
